product_name: Cannondale Prelude Sleeveless Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: In hot weather, reach for the women's Cannondale Prelude Sleeveless Bike Jersey. It does it all, from training to competing, and keeps you cool and comfortable. Soft polyeser/spandex fabric is lightweight, wicks moisture and provides super comfortable 4-way stretch. Offers UPF 40 sun protection. Full-zip front lets you vent as deeply as you want. Water-resistant zippered pocket and 3 rear pockets stow your essentials. The Cannondale Prelude Sleeveless Bike Jersey features a semi-fitted cut.
short_description: In hot weather, reach for the women's Cannondale Prelude Sleeveless Bike Jersey. It does it all, from training to competing, and keeps you cool and comfortable.
